net.consensys.cava.rlpx.wire

Class WireConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.rlpx.wire.WireConnection

  • public final class WireConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A stateful connection between two peers under the Devp2p wire protocol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Default constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WireConnection

        public WireConnection(java.lang.String id,
                      Bytes nodeId,
                      Bytes peerNodeId,
                      org.logl.Logger logger,
                      java.util.function.Consumer<RLPxMessage> writer,
                      java.util.function.Consumer<HelloMessage> afterHandshakeListener,
                      java.lang.Runnable disconnectHandler,
                      java.util.LinkedHashMap<SubProtocol,SubProtocolHandler> subprotocols,
                      int p2pVersion,
                      java.lang.String clientId,
                      int advertisedPort)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the connection
        nodeId - the node id of this node
        peerNodeId - the node id of the peer
        logger - a logger
        writer - the message writer
        afterHandshakeListener - a listener called after the handshake is complete with the peer hello message.
        disconnectHandler - the handler to run upon receiving a disconnect message
        subprotocols - the subprotocols supported by this connection
        p2pVersion - the version of the devp2p protocol supported by this client
        clientId - the client ID to announce in HELLO messages
        advertisedPort - the port we listen to, to announce in HELLO messages

        public AsyncCompletion sendPing()
        Sends a ping message to the remote peer.
        Returns:
